content.en: Blood-brain barrier prediction: Scientists are using algorithms to develop models that can predict the ability of a substance to pass through the blood-brain barrier. These algorithms analyze molecular descriptors and other properties to make these predictions. Different approaches, such as Bayesian models and deep neural networks, are being explored to improve the accuracy of these predictions.
content.da: Blod-hjerne-barriere forudsigelse: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at udvikle modeller, der kan forudsige en substans' evne til at passere gennem blod-hjerne-barrieren. Disse algoritmer analyserer molekylære beskrivelser og andre egenskaber for at lave disse forudsigelser. Forskellige tilgange, såsom Bayesian-modeller og dybe neurale netværk, undersøges for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af ​​disse forudsigelser.
